name: OSLogMessageComponent
desc: The message arguments for a particular entry.

items.name: var argument: OSLogMessageComponent.Argument
items.desc: The argument passed into the message component.

items.name: enum OSLogMessageComponent.Argument
items.desc: An object representing data that corresponds to an argument in a message payload.

items.name: var argumentCategory: OSLogMessageComponent.ArgumentCategory
items.desc: The type of argument that corresponds to the placeholder.

items.name: enum OSLogMessageComponent.ArgumentCategory
items.desc: The data type corresponding to the argument provided in a message payload.

items.name: var formatSubstring: String
items.desc: The text immediately preceding a placeholder.

items.name: var placeholder: String
items.desc: The placeholder text for the message component.

items.name: var argumentDataValue: Data?
items.desc: The argument formatted as a sequence of bytes.

items.name: var argumentDoubleValue: Double
items.desc: The argument formatted as a double.

items.name: var argumentInt64Value: Int64
items.desc: The argument formatted as a signed 64-bit integer.

items.name: var argumentNumberValue: NSNumber?
items.desc: The argument formatted as a number.

items.name: var argumentStringValue: String?
items.desc: The argument formatted as a string.

items.name: var argumentUInt64Value: UInt64
items.desc: The argument formatted as an unsigned 64-bit integer.
